means: 无止境的，不停的，不断重复的

sentence.Network_en: a seemingly unending supply of money
sentence.Network_cn: 似乎源源不断的资金供应

sentence.Network_en: I'm sick of your unending grumbles.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对你的不断埋怨感到厌烦.

sentence.Network_en: They remain unwilling to intervene militarily in what could be an unending war.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们仍然不愿意对一场可能会旷日持久的战争进行军事干预。

list.abs: folks do say that you are trying to discover the unending motion .人家都在说，你是想要发现永久运动。
people are tired of the unending debate about tobacco., 人们厌倦了有关抽烟的无休止的讨论.
how can we stop the unending cycle of violence ., 我们如何才能结束这种无休止的暴力事件.
Religion is a diffuse topic liable to unending disputation whereas theism is not ., 宗教是一个容易引起无休止争论的弥散型话题 , 而有神论则不是.

entry.tran: 不断的；不停的；无休止的
entry.def: If you describe something as unending, you mean that it continues without stopping for a very long time.

example.ex: I do not recall any formal training, just endless work and an unending stream of people!
example.tran: 现在想起来，没有任何正式的培训，有的只是没完没了的工作和无休无止的人流！

example.ex: ...the country's seemingly unending cycle of political violence.
example.tran: 该国一轮又一轮似乎永无休止的政治暴力

sentences.sentence: "the ageless themes of love and revenge"

auth_sentence.content: I've never encountered this level of unending lunacy.
